item.title: Devin add a quote by Stephen Fry
item.description: "The only reason people do not know much is because they do not care to know. They are incurious. Incuriousity is the oddest and most foolish failing there is." -- Stephen Fry

item.title: Devin add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "This is not a novel to be tossed aside lightly. It should be thrown with great force." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Devin add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Devin add a quote by Stephen Fry
item.description: "I am a lover of truth, a worshiper of freedom, a celebrant at the altar of language and purity and tolerance." -- Stephen Fry

item.title: Devin add a quote by Mel Brooks
item.description: "I've been accused of vulgarity. I say that's bullshit." -- Mel Brooks

item.title: Devin add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Paranoid? Probably. But just because you're paranoid doesn't mean there isn't an invisible demon about to eat your face." -- Jim Butcher
